Package ui.textual

Defines a Textual User Interface for the game (using Ansi Escape Colors for terminals).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Colors
    Colors
    Holds the default ANSI Escape Colors, supported in Unix-alike shells and others.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Menu
    MENU - Textual Mode
    Makes an implementation of the interface MENU for exhibiting the game, in a Unix shell.
    Textual
    UI - Textual Mode
    Makes an implementation of the interface UI for exhibiting the game, with colors, in a Unix shell.

Package ui.textual Description

Defines a Textual User Interface for the game (using Ansi Escape Colors for terminals).
